name: Okrety
overview: Okręty is a computer version of the pen-and-paper Battleship game. The game features 2 sizes of playing board, 5 difficulty levels and 1 up to 10 shots per turn, allowing to play with a human or computer player. Higher level means not only smarter opponent, but adds additional difficulty in the form of concealing previously made shots. The number and the size of ships depends on the chosen broad. X mark with transparent background means a simple hit, X mark with filled background shows a flooded ship.
